title: Cataloging and Evaluating Dairy Manure Treatment Technologies

tasks.task: Operating a digestate system on a dairy farm.
subtasks: Conducting on-site visits to evaluate technology installations.
Creating case studies based on site evaluations.
Developing a scoring system for technology assessment.
Publishing recognized and emerging technologies through a catalog.
Facilitating vendor and farmer collaborations through technology evaluation platforms.
